question: 沸かす
sourceMnemonic: You already learned the word <ja>沸く</ja> which means "to boil" or "to grow hot" but this is when you are the one heating the water. It still means <vocabulary>to boil</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to heat</vocabulary>. But remember that you're the one who is doing the heating.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You already learned this reading when you learned <ja>沸く</ja>, so you should be able to read this word as well.
